rules:
Welcome to Hangman!

Rules:
- Guess the word by suggesting letters one at a time.
- You start with 8 incorrect guesses allowed.
- The first and last letters are already revealed.
- If you guess all letters before running out of guesses, you win!
- If you run out of guesses, you lose.

Good luck!
